acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.amount: Amount in token's native decimals (will be normalized to 6)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.logIndex: Index of the burn event in the receipt
params.receiptProof: MPT proof for receipt inclusion (each element is 33 bytes: 32 sibling hash + 1 position flag)
params.tempoHeight: The Tempo block height containing the burn

unlockWithProof(bytes32,address,uint256,.details: Proof format: ABI-encoded (uint64 tempoHeight, bytes receiptRlp, bytes[] receiptProof, uint256 logIndex)

params.amount: Expected amount (verified against decoded burn event)
params.burnId: The burn ID (used only for duplicate check before decoding)
params.recipient: Expected recipient (verified against decoded burn event)

BURN_EVENT_SIGNATURE().notice: Burn event signature from Tempo bridge

deposit(address,uint256,address).notice: Deposit tokens to bridge to Tempo

depositNonces(address).notice: Mapping of deposit nonces per user

isBurnSpent(bytes32).notice: Check if a burn ID has been spent

isUnlocked(bytes32).notice: Check if a burn has been unlocked (alias for isBurnSpent)

lightClient().notice: The Tempo light client for header verification

spentBurnIds(bytes32).notice: Mapping of spent burn IDs (prevents replay)

unlock(uint64,bytes,bytes[],uint256).notice: Unlock tokens based on Tempo burn proof

unlockWithProof(bytes32,address,uint256,.notice: Unlock tokens with ABI-encoded proof (called by bridge relayer)
